title: Fix strategic query to check type label, not membership labels
description:
Current bug: query_strategic() returns any issue with epic:* or milestone:* labels, which incorrectly includes tactical tasks that belong to epics/milestones.

Expected behavior: Only issues with type:epic or type:milestone should be strategic.

Root cause: Strategic query checks if issue has ANY label from strategic namespaces (epic, milestone), but should check if issue has a TYPE label matching strategic types.

Fix: Update query_strategic() to check type_hierarchy for strategic types (levels 1-2), then filter issues by type:epic or type:milestone labels.

Configuration consideration: Currently hardcoded level <= 2 for strategic threshold. Should add strategic_threshold config parameter for full flexibility (e.g., strategic_threshold=1 means only level-1 types). For now, level <= 2 works for default hierarchy.
